Detailed Description

Pixel-based light.

This is a basic PhLight class that draw a texture as a light, this class was meant to be very minimalistic and we encourage users to overload this class to suit your needs.

See also:
PhLightManager

Member Function Documentation

void phoenix::PhLight::draw (  ) 

Draw.

This function draws the light, it is automatically called by PhLightManager.
